floater.name: Model Preview
floater.title: Upload Model
floater.string: Error: Dae parsing issue - see log for details.
Warning: bind shape matrix is not in standard X-forward orientation.
Error: Material of model is not a subset of reference model.
Error: LOD Model has no parent.
Error: Vertex number is more than 65535, aborted!
Levels of detail have a different number of textureable faces.
Levels of detail have a different number of mesh instances.
Level of detail has too many vertices.
LOD materials are not a subset of reference model.
Some physical hulls exceed the vertex limit (256); try an alternative 'Analyze Method'.
Some models exceed the hull limit (256); try 'simplify'.
The physics mesh is too dense or contains degenerate triangles. Use Analyze/Simplify to resolve.
This version contains no Havok support and is not recommended for physics upload in Second Life. Results may be unpredictable.
One or more dimensions is less than 0.5m, only hull-based (analyzed) physics shapes will work correctly.
Skinning disabled due to too many joints: [JOINTS], maximum: [MAX]
Skinning disabled due to [COUNT] unknown joints
Texture coordinates data is not complete.
Found NaN while loading position data from DAE-Model, invalid model.
Found NaN while loading normals from DAE-Model, invalid model.
Negative scale detected, unsupported transform. domInstance_geometry: [LABEL]
Negative scale detected, unsupported post-normalization transform. domInstance_geometry: [LABEL]
Error with dae - traditionally indicates a corrupt file.
Unable to process mesh without position data. Invalid model.

combo_box.combo_item: Choose a standard or manually edit...

line_editor.name: suf_lowest
line_editor.tool_tip: The Suffix used to identify the Lowest LOD file on disk and models within a file.

line_editor.name: suf_low
line_editor.tool_tip: The Suffix used to identify the Low LOD file on disk and models within a file.

line_editor.name: suf_medium
line_editor.tool_tip: The Suffix used to identify the Medium LOD file on disk and models within a file.

line_editor.name: suf_high
line_editor.tool_tip: The Suffix used to identify the High LOD file on disk and models within a file.

line_editor.name: suf_physics
line_editor.tool_tip: The Suffix used to identify the Physics file on disk and models within a file.

line_editor.name: ud_physics
line_editor.tool_tip: Full system path to a simple Collada mesh definition to be used for physics.

color_swatch.label: Physics Edge

color_swatch.name: mesh_preview_physics_fill_color

color_swatch.label: Bad Triangle Edge
